title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง 10.11 - Waste disposal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง 10.11 - Waste disposal

State Regulations

Waste water from all plumbing fixtures shall be discharged into municipal sewers where available. Otherwise suitable facilities shall be installed for the absorption of the wastes by the soil in underground systems, so that no nuisance is created. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง
10.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
